rss.channel:
<<{$channel_title}>
    <{$channel_link}>
    <{$channel_description}
    <{$channel_pubdate}>
  <{$if channel_image}
    
      <{$channel_image_url}>
      <{$channel_image_title}>
      <{$channel_image_link}>
    
  <{$endif channel_image}
  <{$if channel_ttl}
    <{$channel_ttl}>
  <{$endif channel_ttl}

<{$if items}
    

      {item_title}
      {item_link}
      {item_pubdate}
      {item_description}
    {if item_category}
      {item_category_name}
    {endif item_category}
    {if item_author}
      {item_author_email} ({item_author_name})
    {endif item_author}
    {if item_enclosure}
      
    {endif item_enclosure}
      {item_link}
    
<{$endif items}
